original_title: The Fairy Tales of the Brothers Grimm: The Bremen Town Musicians / Table Set Yourself
overview: This animated tale, adapted from the Grimm's' "The Bremen Town Musicians," tells the story of a donkey and his dream to form a band with a dog, a cat and a rooster. A bonus feature, "Table Set Yourself," is also included.
title: The Fairy Tales of the Brothers Grimm: The Bremen Town Musicians / Table Set Yourself
